name: Guardian 41.5mm Watch - Largo Tan Leather Strap

features: Case: Stainless steel, with single curve sapphire crystal.
Dial: Alabaster dial with Super-LumiNova hands.
Functions: Hours, minutes, seconds, and date indicator.
Movement: Argonite 705 quartz movement with Swiss and other imported parts.
Watch Strap: Largo Tan strap hand sewn in the United States from premium leather.
